message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"boyfriend","sentence":"他是男朋友。","image_prompt":"A young man and a young woman stand together, smiling happily. The image is animated, gentle, and slightly dreamlike.","sentence_translation":"He is the boyfriend."}
